disable_password_authentication_for_user.description: Restrict users to SSO sign-in when the user has one or more associated SSO identities

root_moved_permanently_redirection.description: When enabled, it will send 301 Moved Permanently instead of 302 if you want web crawlers to index a different site such as the Home Page URL.

session_expire_from_init.description: When enabled, sessions will expire a specific time after creation even if the session is active. Sessions cannot be extended.
